edu.iit.ir.simpledm.preprocess
Class DataDiscretizer

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--edu.iit.ir.simpledm.preprocess.DataDiscretizer
Direct Known Subclasses:
SimpleDataDiscretizer
public abstract class DataDiscretizer
extends java.lang.Object

Discretizes the continuous variables. DataDiscretizer is an abstract class that will be the super class of SimpleDataDiscretizer or other discretization classes. Each continuous attribute contains this object to transform to categorical type.
